plot: Weekly kids' documentary series in which an established pop music artist auditions aspiring youth acts, selecting and hiring one lucky winner to perform as the opening act at a single venue...
plot_en: Weekly kids' documentary series in which an established pop music artist auditions aspiring youth acts, selecting and hiring one lucky winner to perform as the opening act at a single venue...
plot_es: Weekly kids' documentary series in which an established pop music artist auditions aspiring youth acts, selecting and hiring one lucky winner to perform as the opening act at a single venue...
title: Disney's 2 Hour Tour
